selected_reference.why: Closest sibling command: same base path resolution, images glob support, refine vs explore mode, and optional interactive selection.

references.why: Similar extraction pipeline with base_path detection, variant/refine patterns, and artifact verification.
Orchestrator pattern that composes ui-design extraction commands and demonstrates cross-command execution sequencing.

tooling_anchors.why: Verifiable ccw/src anchor for evidence tables (commands corpus scanning recursion).
